sect1.title: Single Shortest Path
sect1.para:
This filter finds the shortest path between two concepts (that need to be picked in the visualisation window before launching the filter from the menu).
Select a start concept and an end concept in the filter window.
Select an attribute name containing the desired relation weight, or none for a weight of 1.
Tick directed (for a directed shortest path) or undirected mode (leave unselected).
Tick inverse weight if the attribute selected is a probability rather than a weight or a distance.
The algorithm will then compute the shortest path between the start and end concepts.
